altername_name: Megamind: Das Bündnis von Team Mega
name: Megamind: Mega Team Unite
overview: Mega Team Unite is a multiplayer based game released only on Wii. It is based on various mini-games that are organized into levels where the players can battle the Doom Syndicate as the four main characters from the movie, or they can unlock and play as characters from the Doom Syndicate. * Switch between blasters on the fly which become more powerful the more they are used * Create a 4-player "Mega Squad" by choosing from 9 characters, including Megamind * Team up with 1-4 players to defend the city against the Doom Syndicate * Use super abilities to fight Mega Villains and boost your action with power ups * Track down and defeat your enemies with the Mega Essence Tracker and Bio Essence Neutralizer
